     </a>
     <div class="account-dropdown-container">
      <a class="nav-button account-button" href="/auth/csrf?action=login&amp;return_url=https://www.harpersbazaar.com/default/" rel="nofollow">
       <span class="account-text" data-account="Account" data-login="Sign In">
        Sign In
       </span>
      </a>
      <div class="account-dropdown">
       <div class="account-dropdown-links">
        <a class="account-dropdown-link account-link" href="/auth/csrf?action=account&amp;return_url=https://www.harpersbazaar.com/default/" rel="nofollow">
         My Account
        </a>
        <a class="account-dropdown-link account-sign-out" href="/auth/csrf?action=logout&amp;return_url=https://www.harpersbazaar.com/default/" rel="nofollow">
         Sign Out
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </nav>

          <div class="custom-item-inner">

          </a>

           <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Film &amp; TV" data-vars-position="4" href="/culture/film-tv/a35875585/steven-yeun-ali-wong-series/">

      <div class="feed-block-column feed-block-column-middle">

           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="sponsor-bar-placeholder">
          </div>
          <a class="custom-item-title item-title" data-vars-cta="Big Story 8" data-vars-position="1" href="/wedding/a35264899/4-chic-looks-for-the-unconventional-bride/">
           4 Chic Looks For The Unconventional Bride
          </a>

   ( function( d, Modernizr ) {
	d.addEventListener( "DOMContentLoaded", function() {
		var l, h = d.getElementsByTagName( "head" )[ 0 ],
		f = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/harpersbazaar/assets/css/homepage.bcc4720.css"],
		m = ["https://assets.hearstapps.com/sites/harpersbazaar/assets/css/homepage-mobile.6f99821.css"];

		for ( var i = 0, len = f.length; i < len; i++ ) {
			l = d.createElement( "link" );
			l.rel = "stylesheet";
			l.href = Modernizr && Modernizr.mobile ? m[ i ] : f[ i ];

			h.parentNode.insertBefore( l, h );
		}
	} );
} )( document, Modernizr );
  </script>
